questions.question: What is the empirical formula of H2-Mn-DOBDC•DMF2?
At what temperature was the crystal of H2-Mn-DOBDC•DMF2 analyzed?
What is the crystal system of H2-Mn-DOBDC•DMF2?
What is the space group of H2-Mn-DOBDC•DMF2?
What is the final R index for H2-Mn-DOBDC•DMF2 when I>=2σ (I)?
What is the volume of the unit cell for H2-Mn-DOBDC•DMF2?
Does the lithiation of H2-Mn-DOBDC lead to a change in its PXRD pattern?
questions.answer: Yes, the lithiation of H2-Mn-DOBDC leads to a slight structural change in its PXRD pattern.

questions.question: Is the electronic conductivity of Li2-Mn-DOBDC higher than that of H2-Mn-DOBDC?
Does the removal of DMF from H2-M-DOBDC•DMF2 result in a different PXRD pattern?
Can the lithiated version of H2-M-DOBDC withstand higher temperatures without significant mass loss compared to its non-lithiated counterpart?
What is the effect of charge cut-off potential on the electrochemical behavior of Mn-CPO-27?
questions.answer: The increase of the charge cut-off potential leads to extraction of more Li+ and enhancement of the reversibility for Mn-CPO-27.

questions.question: Does the electrolyte nature influence the decomposition process of Li2-Mn-DOBDC at high potentials?
What is the impact of carbon content on the electrochemical performance of Li2-Mn-DOBDC electrodes?
questions.answer: Higher specific capacity is delivered by using 40 wt % of carbon, indicating that carbon content impacts the electrochemical performance of Li2-Mn-DOBDC electrodes.

questions.question: Is the ionic conductivity of Li2-Mg-DOBDC and Li2-Mn-DOBDC significant?
What is the role of π-π stacking interactions in the electronic conductivity of MOFs?
questions.answer: π-π stacking interactions can improve the electronic conductivity of MOFs.
